snippet.title: VECTOR OF ALIENATION: A True OG Stalker Experience | STALKER Mods Review #1
snippet.description:
Despite how amazing they are, STALKER Anomaly and its modpacks tend to overshadow some other/older amazing stalker mods, especially for the newcomers in the community.

In this new video series I'll try to shine the light on some different mods that are worth trying. For this first video we're going back to the roots and talking about Vector of alienation, a mod based on Oblivion lost Remake for the OG Stalker: shadow of Chernobyl.

----------

Get the mod here (standalone):
https://www.moddb.com/mods/olr-vector-of-alienation
